title: Deep Learning Practical Competency Enhancement: Instructional Design Strategies for Synchronous Remote Accounting Education

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain effective operational methods for demonstrations using a document camera and digital pad in a synchronous online environment.
Learners can analyze the impact of hand gesture visibility on learning concentration and social connectedness, then apply it to instructional design.
Learners can present criteria for selecting the optimal demonstration medium (document camera/digital pad) tailored to real lecture scenarios through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
